messages: You are about to uninstall the following product:
Repairing Visual Studio will reset the environment. Local customizations like per-user extensions and your user settings will be removed. Your synchronized settings will be restored.
A restart is required. If needed, any remaining setup will resume automatically after the restart.
Before you remove {0}, you must first uninstall the following products:
Open the log to find the problems.
Select the problem to troubleshoot with the feedback tool:
Unable to open the log file, {0}
DO NOT EDIT BELOW THIS LINE
It looks like you're installing or modifying another product right now.
Please wait until all other operations are finished and try again.
Sorry, the installation failed. Please restart your computer and try again.
Success! Please restart your computer before you start Visual Studio.
Details of the failure can be found in the log file.
Try resetting this installation and reinstalling.
Sorry, the installation failed. Please try again.
You may not be connected to the network
Check back often for new tools that support your favorite development activities.
Sorry, the product definitions failed to load.
Remove Visual Studio Installer and associated installations of Visual Studio?
An update for {0} or one of its components is available.
You may not be connected to the network.
Microsoft Visual Studio - Report a problem
Your privacy is important to us
This operation could not be completed because Visual Studio is still running. Please close Visual Studio and try again.
The installation failed due to improperly signed packages.
The installation directory could not be removed.
Your path name is too long. The full destination path needs to be shorter than {0} characters.
At most one command parameter can be specified
The --installChannelUri options requires that the --channelUri option also be specified
The --channelUri option requires an argument unless --installChannelUri is specified
The --{0} and --{1} options cannot be used at the same time
The --{0} option cannot have a value ({1})
The --{0} option cannot be specified more than once
The "--{0}" option is ignored for the "{1}" command
The "--{0}" option is ignored for the "{1}" command when "--installPath" is specified
The "--norestart" option is ignored if one of "--passive" or "--quiet" is not also specified.
It looks like you're trying to remove a component that's required by the following:
This workload is required and cannot be removed:
If you continue, we'll remove the component and any items listed above that depend on it.
A product matching the following parameters cannot be found:
An installed product matching the following parameters cannot be found:

We offer you the ability to download other Microsoft and third-party software with Visual Studio, so you don't have to install it separately. This software comes with separate license terms. Please note that the third-party software doesn't come from Microsoft but is downloaded from third-party sites, and the licenses for that software are granted by third parties, not Microsoft. By proceeding with this installation, you agree to the license terms for the Microsoft and third-party software you have selected.

By continuing, you agree to the license for the Visual Studio edition you selected. We also offer the ability to download other software with Visual Studio. This software is licensed separately, as set out in the 3rd Party Notices or in its accompanying license. By continuing, you also agree to those licenses.

By continuing, you agree to the license for the Visual Studio edition you selected. We also offer the ability to download other software with Visual Studio. This software is licensed separately, as set out in the 3rd Party Notices or in its accompanying license. By continuing, you also agree to those licenses.
Success! One more step to go. Please restart your computer before you start {0}.
This workload is unavailable right now.
The install command requires the --channelId and --productId options
This feature is not available offline.
The operation you just performed requires installing the following, which may require Visual Studio or your computer to restart.
We’ll install the frameworks, SDKs, and tools that you’ll need. You can add more later with the Visual Studio Installer.

\ \ We invite you to go online to hone your skills and find additional tools to support\ your development workflow.\ \

\ \ Learn\
\
\ \ Whether you're new to development or an experienced developer, we\ have you covered with our tutorials, videos, and sample code.\ \

\ \ Marketplace\
\
\ \ Use Visual Studio extensions to add support for new technologies,\ integrate with other products and services, and fine-tune your experience.\ \
\

\

\
\ \ Get help from Microsoft at Visual Studio Support.\ \
Please close all instances of {0} before proceeding with this operation.

We’ve detected that you have a preview build of Visual Studio 2017 installed on your machine. In order to install an updated version of Visual Studio 2017 we must first completely remove all components of the preview version.
This program requires administrator privileges to perform setup operations. Please rerun the program as administrator.
An installation operation is currently running.
The setup service has unexpectedly been disposed.
Press enter to activate the {0} button and proceed
The nickname cannot contain characters that cannot appear in a file name
The nickname "{0}" is invalid. It cannot contain characters that cannot appear in a file name.
A nickname must be provided to disambiguate this install
When updating from Visual Studio 2017 RC to Visual Studio RTW, you will be required to re-select your workloads and components.
Please confirm that you would like to remove {0}. You will no longer see this section or products that are associated with it.
The nickname cannot be longer than {0} characters
Select a language pack to continue the installation.
This is taking longer than we expected ...
You may not have enough free space on {0}
We noticed something went wrong with your Visual Studio installation. Would you please take a short survey to help us improve the experience?
The following IDs could not be installed...
No matching workload or component found.
Do you want to continue without workloads?

The core Visual Studio editor can open folders, edit files, and manage work items. Visual Studio needs to install additional components to create, open, and debug projects for desktop, mobile, and cloud apps.
Learn more about workloads and components
Your installation has started. While that's happening, we'd like to ask you a few questions about how you’ll be using Visual Studio. This survey will open in your default web browser.
We'd like to learn more about why you decided not to install Visual Studio. This will help us improve the experience for you and other users.
Setup paused. There was a problem
We are in the middle of checking for updates. Please wait a minute and try again.
Sorry, there's a problem with the Visual Studio Installer
You already have the frameworks, SDKs, and tools installed that you need for the development work you selected. You can always add more by coming back to the installer.
We detected a critical installer process was terminated. Would you like to send us feedback?
Visual Studio Installer has run into a problem. Would you like to send us feedback?
